channel.title: S3 on IndieCoder
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on IndieCoder

item.title: Upload Files to AWS S3 Bucket from React Client
item.description: In this blog, we’ll learn how to upload images/videos directly from a React Client to an AWS S3 bucket. The main benefit of this approach is reducing the server load since we don’t need to upload files to our server. We only need access from our server and upload the files directly to AWS S3. Table of Contents File upload design Create an endpoint on the Express server React client for uploading file
